character.name: Bloch
description: Your ship's "mentalist". Specializes in <c=boldPink>reducing incoming damage</c>, <c=boldPink>card draw manipulation</c> and <c=boldPink>discard effects</c>.

DiscardOther.name: Discard Other
DiscardOther.description: Discard {{Count}} random cards, other than this one.

OnHullDamage.name: On Hull Damage
OnHullDamage.description: This action only triggers after your ship receives hull damage with the card still in hand.

Veiling.name: Veiling Aura
Veiling.description: Reduce incoming attack damage by 1 and <c=downside>decrease this by 1</c>. Will not trigger if <c=parttrait>armor</c> will reduce damage to 0.

Intensify.name: Intensify
Intensify.description: All of your auras trigger again for each stack of this. <c=downside>Goes away at start of next turn.</c>
